IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
becomes a particular thing
, začne biti tako.

seg.quote: The smell became stronger and stronger.
It became clear that the Conservatives were not going to win.
We became good friends at once.

sense.def:
Če vprašamo
what has become of someone
, se zanimamo, kje je tista oseba in kaj se je zgodilo z njo.
